name: flexabrain-empire
description: Intelligence Without Limits. Domination Without Compromise.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:oracle" "npm run dev:sentinel" "npm run dev:sage"
scripts.build: npm run build:oracle && npm run build:sentinel && npm run build:sage
scripts.test: npm run test:oracle && npm run test:sentinel && npm run test:sage
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:apis && npm run setup:n8n
scripts.setup:apis: cd oracle-sales-api && npm install && cd ../sentinel-monitoring-api && npm install && cd ../sage-analytics-api && npm install

author: FlexaBrain Empire
